Name: KNOCK
Description: Choose an object that you can see within range. Theobject can be a door, a box, a chest, a set of manacles, apadlock, ar another object that contains a mundane ormagical means that prevents access.A target that is held shut bya mundane lock ar thatis stuck or barred becomes unlocked, unstuck, orunbarred. lf the object has multiple locks, only one ofthem is unlocked.lf you choose a target that is held shut with arcanelock, that spell is suppressed for 10 minutes, duringwhich time the target can be opened and shut normally.When you cast the spell, a loud knock, audible from asfar away as 300 feet, emanates from the target objecl.
